name: Floating Coffin
description:
Attempt to survive on a failing research vessel while a blackhole comes ever closer. Your goal is to manage resources to sustain your food, oxygen, power, body temperature, and other vital resources. Attempt to translate messages from HQ to help co-ordinate a rescue. However, as you slowly come to the realization of your situation, and what its outcome will be, you can always enjoy the view.

Floating Coffin is in the name. There is no good ending. Play through the story put together and try and survive and experience what living on a satellite might be like or just float around and enjoy the view.
